description: To provide notification for the event when Peer goes down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkePeerDown JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddrType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemotePort u 9999 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddrType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalPort u 9999 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRoutingInstance s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdValue s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdValue s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerAAAUserName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerGwName s EXAMPLE

description: The IP address type of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the
IKE SA negotiaton.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddrType

description: The IP address of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IKE SA
negotiation.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddr

description: The port number of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IKE
SA negotiation. The port number zero means the input value is
ignored for this object and the default port is considered.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemotePort

description: The IP address type of the local endpoint (gateway) for the
IKE SA negotiation.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddrType

description: The IP address of the local endpoint (gateway) for the IKE SA
negotiation.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddr

description: The port number of the local gateway (endpoint) for the IKE SA
negotiation. The port number zero means the input value is
ignored for this object and the default port is considered.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalPort

description: Name of the routing instance.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRoutingInstance

description: The type of local peer identity. The local
peer may be identified by:
1. an IP address, or
2. or a fully qualified domain name string.
3. or a distinguished name string.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdType

description: The value of the local peer identity.
If the local peer type is an IP Address, then this
is the IP Address used to identify the local peer.
If the local peer type is id_fqdn, then this is
the FQDN of the remote peer.
If the local peer type is a id_dn, then this is
the distinguished name string of the local peer.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdValue

description: The type of remote peer identity.
The remote peer may be identified by:
1. an IP address, or
2. or a fully qualified domain name string.
3. or a distinguished name string.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdType

description: The value of the remote peer identity.
If the remote peer type is an IP Address, then this
is the IP Address used to identify the remote peer.
If the remote peer type is id_fqdn, then this is
the FQDN of the remote peer.
If the remote peer type is a id_dn, then this is
the distinguished named string of the remote peer.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdValue

description: Identifies the user with the specified authentication
authorization and accounting (AAA) username, associated
with the IKE SA negotiation.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerAAAUserName

description: Name of the IKE gateway.
variables.name: JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerGwName

description: To provide notification for the event of IPSec Tunnels
going down for a peer. These traps are not generated
if the corresponding peer has gone down.

event.Summary: IPSec tunnel for peer $v2 is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkePeerIPSecTunnelDown JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddrType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteGwAddr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemotePort u 9999 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddrType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalGwAddr s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalPort u 9999 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRoutingInstance s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerLocalIdValue s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdType i 0 JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerRemoteIdValue s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerAAAUserName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapPeerGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapIpSecTunVpnName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapIpSecTunTsName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapIpSecTunLocalTS s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-IPSEC-FLOW-MON-MIB::jnxIkeTrapIpSecTunRemoteTS s EXAMPLE
